## Hello!

I'm a GIS Developer with a Computer Science background, currently finishing my Master's in GIS at Hunter College. I specialize in developing geospatial solutions for renewable energy optimization, environmental conservation, and urban infrastructure planning.

**Currently:** QA/QC Specialist at Con Edison\
**Focus Areas:** eGIS data migration, utilities mapping
